976050.name: Capsa - Starter Pack
976050.description:
The Capsa - Starter Pack includes 4 additional vehicles (1 Buggy and 3 Motorboats) as well as additional customization items for characters, vehicles, homes and pets.

Items included in the pack are as follows:

VEHICLES:
  • 4 Drivable Vehicles (Moray Motorboat, Mako Motorboat, Pontoon Motorboat, Scorpion Buggy).
  • Neon Underglow.

CHARACTER:
  • 17 Character Alice Bands (Antenna, Antlers, Bunny, Cat, X-Mas, Beast, Devil, Halo, Mouse, Neon Bear, Neon Bunny, Neon Cat, Neon Heart, Neon Star, Heart, Star)

PETS:
  • 14 Cat Patterns (Black, Blue, Brown Spotted Bengal, Brown Spotted Cheetoh, Brown Striped Toyger, Calico, Chocolate, Chocolate Pointed, Lilac, Silver Spotted Bengal, Silver Spotted Cheetoh, Silver Striped Toyger, Tortoiseshell, White)
  • 3 Cat Outfits (Bee, Dinosaur, Shark) + 2 Hats (Propeller, Pumpkin) + 1 Collar (Glow)

HOMES:
  • Interior items in Mid-Century Modern Style, including additional Sofas, Lamps, Plants and other assorted decor.
  • Exterior items including additional Flowers (for garden and patio), String Lights (San Francisco, Beachshack, Tropical Cottage) and Garden Blanket.
